languages.text: {n}При виде вас лицо Тазарры превращается в маску ярости. Друкарка растягивает губы в оскале, в котором нет ни капли бывшей надменности — лишь обещание боли.{/n} "Ты!... Ублюдочн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай, проклят{mf|ый выродок|ая сука}! Ты заплатишь за каждое мгновение, проведенное мной на этой жалкой планете!"

{n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"
languages.original_text: {n}При виде вас лицо Тазарры превращается в маску ярости. Друкарка растягивает губы в оскале, в котором нет ни капли бывшей надменности — лишь обещание боли.{/n} "Ты!... Ублюдочн{mf|ый|ая} мон-кай, проклят{mf|ый выродок|ая сука}! Ты заплатишь за каждое мгновение, проведенное мной на этой жалкой планете!"

traits.locale_text: {n}As Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that has no trace of the former haughtiness — only a promise of pain.{/n} "You! Crossbred mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

{n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

languages.text: {n}タザーラがこちらに気づき、湧きあがる怒りで顔が酷く歪めた。デュカーリの唇は、かつての高慢さは微塵も感じさせず、苦痛を望むプレデターの笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「害虫が！腐りきったモン＝ケイめ！私がこの哀れな惑星で過ごしたすべての時間を償うのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}タザーラがこちらに気づき、湧きあがる怒りで顔が酷く歪めた。デュカーリの唇は、かつての高慢さは微塵も感じさせず、苦痛を望むプレデターの笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「害虫が！腐りきったモン＝ケイめ！私がこの哀れな惑星で過ごしたすべての時間を償うのだ！」

languages.text: {n}一看到你，塔扎菈立刻变得暴怒不已。她嘴角勾起了掠食者般的冷笑，不复往日的傲慢，只剩下必将让你受苦的决意。{/n}“是你！畸形的猴子，污秽的臭虫！你要为我在这颗恶心的行星上度过的每一刻付出代价！”
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一看到你，塔扎菈立刻变得暴怒不已。她嘴角勾起了掠食者般的冷笑，不复往日的傲慢，只剩下必将让你受苦的决意。{/n}“是你！畸形的猴子，污秽的臭虫！你要为我在这颗恶心的行星上度过的每一刻付出代价！”

languages.text: {n}Cuando Tazarra se fija en ti, su cara se vuelve una mueca furibunda. Los labios de la Drukhari forman una sonrisa depredadora que no conserva su anterior altivez. Solo promete dolor.{/n} «¡Tú! ¡Mon-keigh deforme! ¡Sabandija putrefacta! ¡Pagarás por cada momento que he pasado en ese patético planeta!».
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Tazarra se fija en ti, su cara se vuelve una mueca furibunda. Los labios de la Drukhari forman una sonrisa depredadora que no conserva su anterior altivez. Solo promete dolor.{/n} «¡Tú! ¡Mon-keigh deforme! ¡Sabandija putrefacta! ¡Pagarás por cada momento que he pasado en ese patético planeta!».

languages.text: {n}Quand Tazarra vous remarque, son visage se déforme sous le coup de la fureur. Les lèvres de la Drukhari s'étirent en un rictus de prédateur. Toute trace de dédain a disparu, seule une promesse de douleur subsiste dans son expression.{/n} « Vous ! Méprisable mon-keigh, vermine putride ! Vous allez payer pour chaque instant que j'ai dû passer sur cette planète pitoyable ! »
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand Tazarra vous remarque, son visage se déforme sous le coup de la fureur. Les lèvres de la Drukhari s'étirent en un rictus de prédateur. Toute trace de dédain a disparu, seule une promesse de douleur subsiste dans son expression.{/n} « Vous ! Méprisable mon-keigh, vermine putride ! Vous allez payer pour chaque instant que j'ai dû passer sur cette planète pitoyable ! »

languages.text: {n}Als Tazarra dich bemerkt, verzerrt sich ihr Gesicht zu einer Fratze des Zorns. Die Lippen der Drukhari verziehen sich zu einem Raubtiergrinsen, das nichts von ihrer vormaligen Überheblichkeit an sich hat – nur das Versprechen von Schmerz.{/n} "Ihr! {mf|Missgestalteter|Missgestaltete} Chem-Pan-Sey, verfaultes Ungeziefer! Ihr werdet für jeden Augenblick bezahlen, den ich auf diesem erbärmlichen Planeten verbracht habe!"
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Tazarra dich bemerkt, verzerrt sich ihr Gesicht zu einer Fratze des Zorns. Die Lippen der Drukhari verziehen sich zu einem Raubtiergrinsen, das nichts von ihrer vormaligen Überheblichkeit an sich hat – nur das Versprechen von Schmerz.{/n} "Ihr! {mf|Missgestalteter|Missgestaltete} Chem-Pan-Sey, verfaultes Ungeziefer! Ihr werdet für jeden Augenblick bezahlen, den ich auf diesem erbärmlichen Planeten verbracht habe!"

languages.text: {n}Tazarra seni görünce yüzünü öfke bürüyor. Drukhari'nin dudakları, dişlerini sergileyen bir gülümsemeye yer açmak için ayrılıyor. Eski kibrinden eser yok, artık yalnızca acı çektirmeyi amaçlıyor.{/n} "Sen! Şekilsiz mon-keigh, adi leş! Bu acınası gezegende geçirdiğim her anın bedelini ödeyeceksin!"
languages.original_text: {n}When Tazarra notices you, her face contorts into a mask of rage. The Drukhari's lips stretch into a predatory grin that bears no trace of her former haughtiness — only the promise of pain.{/n} "You! Malformed mon-keigh, putrid vermin! You will pay for every moment that I have spent on this pitiful planet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tazarra seni görünce yüzünü öfke bürüyor. Drukhari’nin dudakları, dişlerini sergileyen bir gülümsemeye yer açmak için ayrılıyor. Eski kibrinden eser yok, artık yalnızca acı çektirmeyi amaçlıyor.{/n} "Sen! Şekilsiz mon-keigh, adi leş! Bu acınası gezegende geçirdiğim her anın bedelini ödeyeceksin!"
